description.p: To clerics of the hospitality domain, the table is a place as sacred as any temple. They exemplify the warmth that comes with feasting and the beauty of raising crops and livestock to be enjoyed, as championed by gods such as Birgantia, Demeter, Hathor, and Uller. Though they are responsible for the slaughter, they value using every piece of a kill and celebrating the life that is continued in the meals these ingredients create.

Many clerics of this domain travel the land preparing meals for those they care for, hunting the biggest game, and searching for the holiest of ingredients; while others preside over great celebrations of harvest.

description.p: You gain proficiency with cook's utensils and martial weapons.

You can prepare a scrumptious meal for your allies. Over the course of an hour, which can be accomplished during a short rest, you can make a hearty meal that can serve a number of creatures up to 1 + proficiency bonus on a surface within 5 feet of you.
A creature can use an action to eat the meal. When it does so, its hit point maximum and current hit points increase by a number equal to your cleric level for the next 8 hours.

description.p: You can apply your knowledge of butchery to the carving of your enemies. When you make a melee weapon attack against a creature that is not a Construct, you can expend a use of your Channel Divinity to deal additional damage equal to twice your Wisdom modifier.

sheet.description: When you make a melee weapon attack against a creature that is not a Construct, you can expend a use of your Channel Divinity to deal additional damage equal to twice your Wisdom modifier.

description.p: You can extend your mastery of the kitchen to your allies. When an ally within 30 feet of you makes a melee weapon attack against a creature that is not a Construct, you can use a reaction to grant the attack a bonus to damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
You have a number of uses of this feature equal to your proficiency bonus and you regain all expended uses at the end of a long rest.

sheet.description: When an ally within 30 feet of you makes a melee weapon attack against a creature that is not a Construct, you can use a reaction to grant the attack a +{{wisdom:modifier}} to damage.

description.p: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with the warmth of hospitality and hearth. Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 1d8 fire damage to the target. When you reach 14th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8.

description.p: Your prowess as a chef is unmatched. You always have heroes' feast prepared, it doesn't count toward your number of spells prepared, and you ignore the spell's material components.
